      default Point IPath2.trace2(float amt)
      Maps a given floating point number from 0 to this.getPerimeter() to a Point along the perimeter of the Path.
      Methods in paths2 with parameters of type Point

      default boolean IPath2.inside(Point pt)
      Returns true if pt is a point within the path (which would imply that this is a closed path) and false otherwise.

      Sets the center point of this Path to the given pt.

      static void Line.trace(Point pt, float ax, float ay, float bx, float by, float amt)
      Interpolates between the line defined by (ax, ay) and (bx, by) by the given amount (a value between 0 and 1) and stores the result in the given point.
      static void Line.trace(Point pt, Point a, Point b, float amt)
      Interpolates between the line defined by (a.x, a.y) and (b.x, b.y) by the given amount (a value between 0 and 1) and stores the result in the given point.
      default void IPath2.trace2(Point pt, float amt)
      Maps a given floating point number from 0 to this.getPerimeter() to a given Point along the perimeter of the Path.
